name: Intercept Moving Objects! Smarter Enemy Movement Tutorial
name_original: Intercept Moving Objects! Smarter Enemy Movement Tutorial
description:
Hello Everyone!

Tutorial on how to utilize the prediction of the intercept point of two moving objects to improve enemy movement in your games! By predicting where your player is going, your enemy movement schemes / AI can improve and raise the quality / look and feel of your games.

---

GAME CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to move player around.  Check the Intercept Box to demonstrate the better enemy movement scheme.

---

I have included the project file to follow along  and review how the event sheet / javascript work together.  Feel free to use however, no credit needed, cc0 etc. 

Check it out on YouTube and let me know what you think!  Subscribe if you enjoyed, would make my day :)
